title: BBC's Sherlock: Christmas Special - Trailer
text: BBC's Sherlock: Christmas Special - Trailer Reported by Outsiders - 2015.10.09 Before they return for their three-episode fourth season of their international hit mystery series "Sherlock," Benedict Cumberbatch and Martin Freeman will star in a one-shot Holiday Special where they take the super-sleuth team up of Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson back into the Victorian-era to solve a proper murder mystery. Check out the new trailer for the Holiday Special which just popped up online today. Sherlock stars Benedict Cumberbatch, Martin Freeman, Rupert Graves, Andrew Scott, Una Stubbs, Amanda Abbington
